mapper.insert: insert into RList(Resell_rno, memberno, Rafflename, nickname, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone, spot) values ( #{Raffleno}, #{memberno},#{Rafflename} ,#{nickname},#{username},#{post}, #{addr1},#{addr2}, #{phone}, #{spot})
insert into RList(Sell_rno, memberno, Rafflename, nickname, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone) values ( #{Raffleno}, #{memberno},#{Rafflename} ,#{nickname},#{username},#{post}, #{addr1},#{addr2})
